Setup

MAIN LAPTOP

While I could manually list all my laptops specs, itâ€™s the 21st century, we have the glorious piece of software that is Neofetch!

While it just says Silverblue in the fetch, I actually use the silverblue-nvidia image made by the Universal Blue project, so I get goodies like Nvidia drivers and Distrobox installed and configured out of the box.

APPS

  • Browser: Firefox (Flathub)
  • Code Editor: Code - OSS (Flathub)
  • Music: Amberol (Flathub)
  • Notes: Iotas (Flathub) (synced with Nextcloud)
  • Terminal: Black Box (Flathub)
  • Wallpapers: Damask
  • Office: Nextcloud Office (web)
